name: Doki Doki Loser MC
storyline: It's a very serious and philosophical mod exploring the idea of what if MC was the most despicable of people.And with a chance to enter the Literature Club, he will take any opportunity to be with one of the cute four girls! But, why only one, when you can have more?Disclaimer: This mod shouldn't be taken seriously, as it's just a comedy mod. Please, before criticizing this mod, I recommend you try it.
summary: Doki Doki: Loser MC is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that transforms the original experience by focusing on an extremely passive, insecure and socially awkward protagonist (MC). Unlike the standard version of the game, where the MC is a relatively neutral character, in this mod he is portrayed as a complete “loser”, resulting in hilarious, embarrassing and even frustrating interactions with the girls in the club.
